rooms.description: Open-plan living area with modern finishes and large windows for natural light.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living area, providing a seamless flow of space.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with island counter, high-end appliances, and an integrated dining bar.
Spacious bedroom with a private balcony that adheres to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Comfortable guest room with its own balcony and ample natural light.
Another guest bedroom designed for flexibility; includes a small balcony space.
Dedicated workspace with soundproofing and natural light considerations.
Private entertainment area featuring state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment and comfortable seating.
Fully equipped gym with specialized flooring and ample space for various workout equipment.
Conveniently located storage and utility area.

openings.description: Expansive entrance porch that integrates with the living area for a modern, welcoming approach.
Large balcony attached to Master Bedroom ensuring optimal sunlight and Vastu compliance.
Balcony attached to Guest Bedrooms offering private outdoor space.
Large window providing abundant natural light to Living Room and Kitchen.
Seamless transition for an open-plan interior.
